00001 package liquibase.exception;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.change.Change;
00004 
00005 public class InvalidChangeDefinitionException extends LiquibaseException {
00006 
00007     public InvalidChangeDefinitionException(String message, Change change) {
00008         super(change.getTagName()+" in '"+change.getChangeSet().toString(false)+"' is invalid: "+message);
00009     }
00010 }
